div.p:
FRESH ARRIVALS
of
NEW STAPLE AND FANCY GOODS,
for
AUCTION SALES

We have just received, direct from the Eastern Cities, a large, well=assorted and desirable Stock of NEW STAPLE AND FANCY DRY GOODS, which we can, and will sell at unusually low prices, and which we will offer at Auction without reserve, on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday, the 11th, 12th, and 18th of July next.

Our Stock is very complete, embracing almost every variety of Dry Goods. Also a large lot of Hats, Bonnets, Boots, and Shoes. Terms Liberal. And on Friday the 14th, we will sell for cash, a general variety of GROCERIES, LIQUORS, &C and et cetera . MORTON, SMITH & CO Company . Nashville, June 17th, 1848

FUTURE SALES. August 8th, 9th and 10th; September 19th, 20th and 21st; October, 10th, 11th and 12th; November, 7th, 8th, and 9th; December 5th, 6th and 7th. M Morton . S Smith . & CO Company . John T.S. Fall, Book and Job Pr-Nashville,
Tennessee .
